Text: Hi Mark Just wanted to drop you a line to say hello Ive been thinking about you a lot with recent events down in Houston David said hes spoken with you and youre fine Thats good to hear Things are great up here I began work last Monday the nd and have gotten settled in quite nicely I really like it so far Everyones very sharp and extremely approachable Davids been really nice in checking in on me and has brought me in on the outsourcing initiative hes leading Ill go now I know youre busy Have a good weekend and a better next week Noble This email message is for the sole use of the intended recipients and may contain confidential and privileged information Any unauthorized review use disclosure or distribution is prohibited If you are not the intended recipient please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all copies of the original message To reply to our email administrator directly send an email to BROBECK PHLEGER HARRISON LLP
